subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Tennessee Titans have wrapped up only unsigned draft pick, agreeing to terms with the first-round selection Chris Johnson. Johnson, a running back out of East Carolina, was the 24th pick in the draft.
snippet: The Tennessee Titans have wrapped up only unsigned draft pick, agreeing to terms with the first-round selection Chris Johnson. Johnson, a running back out of East Carolina, was the 24th pick in the draft.
